wikipedia_page.main: Edward Coleman (5 September 1891 – 2 April 1917) was an English cricketer. He played for Essex between 1911 and 1912. He was killed in action during World War I.

response: *Edward Coleman (martyr), victim of the Titus Oates plot
*Edward Coleman (gangster) (died 1839), Irish gang founder in New York City
*Edward Coleman (miner) (1830–1913), California Gold Rush mine manager, president and superintendent
